meta.description: Optimize the number of small and large kegs used to maximize the total amount of glacial water transported.

sets.name: KEGS
sets.description: Types of kegs available for transporting water.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each type of keg in liters.

params.name: max_kegs
params.description: Maximum number of each type of keg available.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of kegs of each type to use.

objective.name: max_total_water
objective.description: Maximize the total amount of glacial water transported.

constraints.name: max_small_kegs
constraints.description: Cannot use more small kegs than available.

constraints.name: max_large_kegs
constraints.description: Cannot use more large kegs than available.

constraints.name: total_kegs_limit
constraints.description: Cannot use more than 25 kegs in total.

constraints.name: min_large_kegs
constraints.description: At least 5 kegs must be large.

constraints.name: small_large_ratio
constraints.description: At least twice as many small kegs must be used than large kegs.
